{ "step_by_step_thinking": "Lathe cut silver alloy is a type of dental amalgam. It does not require the least amount of mercury, so option A is incorrect. The tensile strength of lathe cut silver alloy is not comparable to high copper unicompositional alloy, so option C is incorrect.
